scripts.test: nwbuild -r ./ || npm install nw-builder -g && nwbuild -r ./ || echo [31;1mEnsure you have installed Node.js then try again[0m && pause
scripts.preinstall: npm list nw-builder -g || npm install nw-builder -g || echo [31;1mEnsure you have installed Node.js then try again[0m && pause
scripts.build: nwbuild ./ -o ../builds -p win64,win32 --winIco ./logo.ico || npm install nw-builder -g && nwbuild ./ -o ../builds -p win64,win32 --winIco ./logo.ico || echo [31;1mEnsure you have installed Node.js then try again[0m && pause
